channel.title: Divine-Fatality - Where people become legends! Check us Out!
channel.description:
10261990
[center] [URL=http://"http://divine-fatality.com/play/Mainclient.jar"][IMG]http://www.grinderscape.org/images/bPES2.png[/img]Download Client[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://divine-fatality.com/play/"][IMG]http://www.grinderscape.org/images/webclient.png[/img]Play on Webclient[/URL]
[URL=http://"http://divine-fatality.com/forums/index.php?action=highscores"][IMG]http://www.grinderscape.org/images/highscore.gif[/img]Compete to be the Best![/URL]
[URL=http://"http://divine-fatality.com/forums/"][IMG]http://www.grinderscape.org/images/2wqskl5.png[/img]Website[/URL]
Why should you choose Divine-Fatality? Well here's a list of reasons below!
Features: - FULL Npc Dicing! - FULL Curses have been added! - Full and flawless dicing and gambling! - Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena! - Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe! - First ever fully operational Grand Exchange system! - First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room! - Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys! - New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs! - Lottery, win big or go home! - Perfected name changing system! - Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options! - Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles! - Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores! - Generous PvP drop tables ranging from artifacts to chaotic items! - Proper curse prayers! - Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself! - Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes! - Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks! - Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag! - Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience! - Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress to fame! - Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you're never alone! -Partial Summoning Skill
[img]http://divine-fatality.com/ipics/1.png[/img]
[img]http://divine-fatality.com/ipics/2.png[/img]
[img]http://divine-fatality.com/ipics/3.png[/img]

[/center]

item.title: Divine-Fatality - Where people become legends! Check us Out!

@Null_Amount wrote:

Your server says “divine-fatality” but all your pictures, even your vote page, says Archlegacy.

Read full topic

item.title: Divine-Fatality - Where people become legends! Check us Out!
item.dc:creator: @divine-fatality divine-fatality
item.description:
@divine-fatality wrote:

10261990

[center]
Download Client

Play on Webclient

Compete to be the Best!

Website

Why should you choose Divine-Fatality? Well here’s a list of reasons below!

Features:

  • FULL Npc Dicing!
  • FULL Curses have been added!
  • Full and flawless dicing and gambling!
  • Full and flawless staking at the Duel Arena!
  • Full and flawless Bank PIN system to keep your items safe!
  • First ever fully operational Grand Exchange system!
  • First ever fully flawless operational Drop Party Room!
  • Proper combat, hybriding suppot with F-Keys!
  • New and updated items always being added such as handcannons, and chaotic staffs!
  • Lottery, win big or go home!
  • Perfected name changing system!
  • Perfected donator crown changing, with tons of options!
  • Loyalty titles, pre-set and custom titles!
  • Custom stores such as PvP Stores, Slayer Stores, and Donor Stores!
  • Generous PvP drop tables ranging from artifacts to chaotic items!
  • Proper curse prayers!
  • Tutorial on login to easily orient yourself!
  • Proper clue scrolls and full puzzle boxes!
  • Proper item effects such as Spirit Shields, including all special attacks!
  • Proper banking with new banking features such as live searching and a money bag!
  • Great and stable economy, promising an enjoyable playing experience!
  • Perfectly accurate leaderboards so you can always track your progress to fame!
  • Great community with a full website and forums to ensure you’re never alone!
    -Partial Summoning Skill

[/center]
